caption.p: Schematic illustration showing predicted transcription factors to the Slc27a3 region investigated by pyrosequencing. The Slc27a3 gene contains a 850bp CpG island that extends from −176 bp upstream of the transcription start site to exon 2. Transcription factor binding sites spanning CpGs 1–6 (bold, underlined) within Slc27a3 exon 1 were identified using PROMO software. The following factors were identified: Nkx2-1- NK2 homeobox 1, E2F-1 – E2F Transcription Factor 1, WT1 I – Wilms’ tumour protein 1 and GCF – GC-Rich Sequence DNA-Binding Factor
